titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Health Record Advisory Committee Act
Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Health Record Advisory Committee Act
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish an advisory committee on the implementation by the Department of Veterans Affairs of an electronic health record.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Department of Veterans Affairs Electronic Health Record Advisory Committee Act
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to establish the Electronic Health Record Advisory Committee to provide guidance regarding the implementation of and transition to an electronic health record system.
